401.title: 401: Authorization Required
401.description: Oops! It seems you've encountered an access barrier. Please ensure you are correctly authenticated to access this area.

403.title: 403: Forbidden Page
403.description: Oops! It seems you do not have permission to access this page.

404.title: 404: The page you are looking for is not here
404.description: You attempted to access an incorrect route or ended up here by mistake. Whatever the case, try using the navigation.

410.title: The page you are looking for is not here
410.description: You attempted to access an incorrect or expired route.

500.title: 500: Internal Server Error
500.description: Oh no! It seems our servers are having a bad day. Don't worry, we are busy resolving this technical issue.

validations.string: This field must be an alphanumeric text.
validations.number: This field must be a number.
validations.stringOrNumber: This field must be a text or a number.
validations.formatEmail: This field must be a valid email.
validations.charExceded: This field must have less than {{maxChars}} characters.
validations.file-invalid-type: The selected file type is not allowed.
validations.fileTypeMustBeCsv: The selected file type is not allowed. It must be a .csv file.
validations.validationMin: Password must be at least 8 characters long
validations.passwordWithNoLowercase: Password must have at least one lowercase letter
validations.passwordWithNoUppercase: Password must have at least one uppercase letter
validations.passwordWithNoDigit: Password must have at least one digit
validations.passwordWithNoSpecialChar: Password must have at least one special character
